name: No Service Provider (Global Game jam 2018)
description:
No Service Provider is  Walking  simulator  Where you play  as a  Robot  in  his  attempts  to  fix  the telecommunication  towers. 

Objective: Collect as many Telecommunication parts and avoid thugs; But Watch out for your signal! 

Controls:  WASD to move,  Space to Jump,  Ctrl/M1 to Run (consumes battery) 

_______________________________________________________

  • Inspired by the effects of Hurricane Maria on Puerto Rico.
  • Winner of Best Use of The Theme Award  at  the Global Game jam 2018, Held in Puerto Rico.

_______________________________________________________
